articles.title: Saturn set for rare space event today – how to see planet shine 'at brightest and best' - Daily Express
articles.description: SATURN is at opposition today and that means the Ringed Giant is up-front and centre in the heavens. Express.co.uk explains everything you need to know on how to spot Saturn tonight.

articles.title: Life after death: Bill Nye says 'overwhelming evidence' proves there is no afterlife - Daily Express
articles.description: LIFE after death does not exist, at least according to science popularizer Bill Nye the Science Guy who explained why he thinks there is 'overwhelming evidence' against the idea of an afterlife.
